titles.title: Scriptural readings for the Night Hours / Rәʾәyä täʾamәr, Vision of St. John the Evangelist about the Miracles of Mary / Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Scriptural readings for the Night Hours (fols. 3ra-6vb) I-1) 5th Hour (fols. 3ra-4ra) I-2) 6th Hour (fols. 4ra-6ra) I-3) 9th Hour (fols. 6ra-6vb) II) Rәʾәyä täʾamәr, Vision of St. John the Evangelist about the Miracles of Mary (fols. 6vb-22va) III) Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year (fols. 22va-116ra) III-1) Scriptural readings for liturgical periods, fasts and feasts (for the entire year) (fols. 22va-80vb; 109rb-116ra) - Liturgical period Yoḥannәs: fols. 22va-24rb - Liturgical period Fәre: fols. 24rb-25va - Liturgical period Mäsqäl: fols. 25va-27rb - Liturgical period Ṣәge: fols. 27rb-28rb - Liturgical period Mäḍäw: fols. 28rb-29vb - Liturgical period ʾAstämḥәro: fols. 29vb-31rb - Liturgical period Sәbkät: fols. 31rb-33va - Liturgical period Bәrhan: fols. 33va-33vb - Liturgical period Nolawi: fols. 33vb-34va - Liturgical period Lәdät: fols. 34va-36ra - Feast of the Epiphany (Ṭәmqәt): fols. 36ra-37rb - Vigil of a feast (Wazema): fols. 37rb-38vb - Feast dedicated to Mary (bäʿalä Maryam): fols. 38vb-41ra - Feast dedicated to the Son (bäʿalu Wäld, sic): fols. 41ra-41vb - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fols. 41vb-42rb - 8th Sunday before Easter, Sunday of “He who descended…” (zä-wärädä…) or “of the Encounter with the Fast” (Qäbbäla ṣom): fols. 42rb-44ra - 7th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Holy” (Qәddәst): fols. 44ra-45va - 6th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Temple” (Mәkwәrab): fols. 45va-46vb - 5th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Paralytic” (Mäḍagwәʿ): fols. 46vb-42rb - 4th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Mount of Olives” (Däbrä Zayt): fols. 42rb-50vb - 3rd Sunday before Easter, Sunday of the “Good Servant” (Gәbәr ḫer): fols. 50vb-53rb - Palm Sunday (Hosaʿәna): fols. 53rb-55ra - Resurrection (Tәnśaʾe): fols. 55ra-57vb - Liturgical period of the Resurrection (zä-zämäna Tәnśaʾe): fols. 57vb-59vb - Ascension (ʿƎrgät): fols. 59vb-61rb - Pentecost (Ṗaraqliṭos): fols. 61rb-63ra - Fast of the Apostles (Ḥawaryat): fols. 63ra-64vb - Liturgical period Kәrämt (“Rainy season”): fols. 64vb-66vb - Feast of the Trinity (Śәllase): fols. 66vb-68va - Transfiguration (Däbrä Tabor): fols. 68va-70ra - Feast of the Circumcision (Gәzrät): fols. 70ra-70vb - Feasts of the Righteous Ones and Martyrs (Ṣadәqan wä-Sämaʿtat): fols. 70vb-73ra - Feats of Angels (Mälaʾәkt): fols. 73ra-75va - Daily readings (zä-wätr): fols. 75va-76vb - Sundays (sänabәt): fols. 76vb-78va - Fast of Nineveh (Nänäwi): fols. 78va-78vb - Feast of the Mountain of Zion (Ṣәyon): fols. 78vb-79rb - Feast of the Wedding of Cana (Qana zä-Gälila): fols. 79rb-79vb - Feast of the Upbringing (Ḥәnḍät): fols. 79vb-80vb - Feast of the Bridegroom (Märʿawi): fols. 109rb-111rb - Liturgical period of the Revelation (zä-zämänä ʾAstärʾәyo): fols. 111rb-112vb - Feast of Melchizedek (Mälkä Ṣәdәq): fols. 112vb-115ra - For the Mass (Qәddase): fols. 115ra-115vb - Explicit: fols. 115vb-116ra III-2) Scriptural readings for the days of the week (fols. 80vb-109rb) - Monday (sänuy): fols. 80vb-83va; 94vb-96va - Tuesday (śälus): fols. 83va-85ra; 96va-98rb - Wednesday (räbuʿ): fols. 85ra-86va; 98rb-100ra - Thursday (ḥamus): fols. 86va-88va - Friday (ʾarb): fols. 88va-90vb; 100ra-101vb - Saturday (qädamit): fols. 90vb-92rb; 101vb-109rb - Sunday (ʾǝḥud): fols. 92rb-94vb
Additio 1.

donors.donor: haläqa Täfäri and haläqa Gәrmay (s. Additio 1). Names of other individuals are mentioned in the supplication formulas: Gäbrä Maryam (e.g. fols. 10ra, 43ra, 45va), ʾabunä Wäldä Mikaʾel (e.g. fols. 13ra, 91rb, 99rb), Wälättä Mädḫәn (e.g. fols. 22va, 38vb, 55ra), Taʿәka Śәllase (e.g. fols. 25va, 29ra, 42vb), Wälättä Täklä Haymanot (e.g. fols. 32rb, 44ra, 69rb), Ḥabtä Mikaʾel (e.g. fols. 34va, 37rb, 57vb), ʾabunä Gäbrä Śәllase (fols. 22va, 92rb, 96vb), Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabәḥer (fols. 31rb, 100ra), ʿAmätä ʿAbiyä ʾƎgziʾ (fols. 80vb, 98rb), Gäbrä Ḫәywät (fols. 93rb, 103va).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered by reddish brown tooled leather (remaining only on the inner face of the back board). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather on the inner face of the back board (1 tool is used: double line fillet)

bnothers.bnother: Two rows of small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II፪(8/fols. 11r-18v) – III፫(8/fols. 19r-26v) – IV፬(8/fols. 27r-34v) – V(8/fols. 35r-42v) – VI፮(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 43r-50v) – VII፯(8/fols. 51r-58v) – VIII፰(8/fols. 59r-66v) – IX፱(8/fols. 67r-74v) – X፲(8/fols. 75r-82v) – XI፲፩(10; s.l. 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 83r-92v) – XII(8/fols. 93r-100v) – XIII፲፫(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 101r-108v) – XIV፲፬(8/fols. 109r-116v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors; incipit of Text I and its sections; first two lines of Text II and its sections; first two lines of Text III-1; first two lines of Text III-2; titles of books to be read; directives to the ministers; the word barәkännä, “bless us” in Text I-2 (fols. 5rb-6ra); abbreviation of the directives yәbәl kahәn, “the priest says”, yәbәl diyaqon, “the deacon says” and yәbәl ḥәzb, “the people say” in Text III-2 (fol. 83ra); elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals. On the incipit page of Texts I, III-1 and III-2 (fols. 3r, 22va, 80vb) a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines). On fol. 103rb, a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ይካ፡ for ይብል፡ ካህን፡ ይዲ፡ for ይብል፡ ዲያቆን፡ ይሕ፡ for ይብል፡ ሕዝብ፡

otherdetails.otherdetail: Text III is called Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw in the explicit (s. fol. 115vb).

additional.det: The names of the donors, haläqa Täfäri and haläqa Gәrmay, the date of the donation, 1930 A.M. (=1937/38 A.D.) and the name of the church which received the donation, Yoḥannǝs Mäṭmǝq Dǝbla, are mentioned.

extras.extra: - Unreadable stamp: fol. 2v. - Crude drawings of crosses in pencil: fols. 2r-2v. - Pen trials: fols. 2r-2v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Finely decorated notes written in the upper margin indicate assigned readings for Text III in fols.: ዘዮሐንስ: fol. 22va ዘፍሬ፡ fol. 24rb ዘመስቀል: fol. 25va ዘጽጌ: fol. 27rb ዘመጸው፡ fol. 28rb ዘኣስተምሕሮ፡ fol. 29vb ዘስብከት፡ 31rb ዘብርሃን፡ fol. 33va ዘኖላዊ፡ fol. 33vb ዘልደት፡ fol. 34va ዘጥምቅት፡ fol. 36ra ዘዋዜማ፡ fol. 37rb ዘበዓለ፡ ማርያም፡ fol. 38vb ዘበዓሉ፡ ወልድ፡ fol. 41ra ዘግዝረት፡ fol. 41 vb ዘወረደ፡ fol. 42rb ዘቅድስት፡ fol. 44ra ዘምክውራብ፡ fol. 45va ዘመፃግውዕ፡ fol. 46vb ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ fol. 42rb ዘገብር፡ ኄር፡ fol. 50vb ዘሆሣዕና፡ fol. 53rb ዘትንሣኤ፡ fol. 55ra ዘዘመና፡ ትንሣኤ፡ fol. 57vb ዘዕርገት፡ fol. 59vb ዘጳራቅሊጦስ፡ fol. 61rb ዘሐዋርያት፡ fol. 63ra ዘክረምት፡ fol. 64vb ዘሥላሴ፡ fol. 66vb ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር፡ fol. 68va ዘግዝረት፡ fol. 70ra ዘጻድቃን፡ ወሰማዕት፡ fol. 70vb ዘመላእክት፡ fol. 73ra ዘዘወትር፡ fol. 75va ዘሰናብት፡ fol. 76vb ዘነነዊ፡ fol. 78va ዘጽዮን፡ fol. 78vb ዘቃና፡ ዘገሊላ፡ fol. 79rb ዘሕንፀት፡ fol. 79vb ዘሰኑይ፡ fols. 80vb; 94vb ዘሠሉስ፡ fols. 83va; 96va ዘረቡዕ፡ fols. 85ra; 98rb ዘሐሙስ፡ fol. 86va ዘኣርብ፡ fols. 88va; 100ra ዘቀዳም፡ fols. 90vb; 101vb ዘእሁድ፡ fol. 92rb ዘመርዓዊ፡ fol. 109rb ዘዘመነ፡ ኣስተርእዮ፡ fol. 111rb ዘመልከ፡ ጼዴቅ፡ fol. 112vb ዘቅዳሴ፡ fols. 115ra
